channel.title: Apple Silicon M1 on Tech

item.title: Docker on Apple Silicon Mac
item.description: How to run Docker on Apple Silicon Mac # Install Rosetta # % softwareupdate --install-rosetta --agree-to-license Enable Rosetta # Open Docker Desktop Extensions ï¸™ > Settings > Features in development Check Use Rosetta for x86/amd64 emulation on Apple Silicon docker run # Add the following option to docker run command. --platform linux/x86_64 docker-compose.yml # Add platform under container name. platform: linux/amd64
